item.description:
Har gao! Shiu Mai! Yu Shi Gao!

Join us for our semi-regular dim sum outing. We can talk geek, and eat ourselves silly. We're coming back to an old favorite. Come "yum cha" with us at Emperor's Garden. Feel free to invite non-writers.

Alas, this is probably not for the vegetarian, or those following any sort of strict dietary regimen. The bill will be split evenly among all who attend, so the more the merrier/cheaper! (Cost is usually less than $15 per person.)

For more about dimsum, here's a small website I put together to try to explain:

Dim Sum in Boston

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum Meetup!
